prompts: Create a majestic fire-type bird with wings that look like flames.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire and flight.
Generate a vibrant, fiery creature with stunning red and yellow plumage.
Make a Pokemon that soars through the skies with a radiant aura.
Imagine a legendary avian Pokemon that represents the sun and warmth.
Design a powerful fire-flying type with a striking appearance.
Give me a mythical bird Pokemon that leaves a trail of embers.
